about_the_game:
Step into the unique world of Kaido Genkai – an open-world racing exploration game that blends the excitement of high-speed races with the charm of anime-style graphics. Set in a nostalgic 90's fictional Japanese countryside, Kaido Genkai invites you to explore a vibrant world filled with unique characters and hidden treasures. As an RPG, this game offers more than just racing; it’s an adventure where you learn about your past, challenge rivals, and unlock an array of unique cars, each with their own set of liveries.

Race through lush landscapes in a riverside town to discover all it has to offer, all passionately designed to capture the essence of 90's Japan. The open-world environment is rich with secrets waiting to be discovered. Whether you're competing in high-stakes races or leisurely exploring the countryside, Kaido Genkai promises exploration, racing, and adventure.

This game is a work in progress. Release date TBD.

short_description: Kaido Genkai is an open-world racing exploration game that blends the excitement of high-speed races with the charm of anime-style graphics and RPG elements, set in a nostalgic 90's fictional Japanese countryside. Come explore the open world and see who you meet along the way!
